Events

Upcoming events

28/02/17

https://www.facebook.com/events/634424640083252/

The infamous Mystery Bus is back again for another lap around a secret location. Hosted by the two biggest student societies at Monash Caulfield, BCSS and MMSS will ensure you spend your first University party singing 'the wheels on the bus...' at the top of your lungs.

02/03/17

https://www.facebook.com/events/1824281951169521/

Have you ever wanted to relive all those bad decisions that you committed while on schoolies, or do you want to drink Malibu until you are throwing up coconuts? MMSS presents to you the solution, our party 'Freaky in Waikiki'. Come down with us to the club and bring out those hula skirts and gross Hawaiian shirts that probably cost $2 and order yourself enough summer cocktails until you are drunk enough that you think you are on the beach.
